exam.q: 1 ms is how many ns?

Compress 1K bytes with Zippy time (ns)?

Random Read 4K from SSD flash memory (Elephant-Lite) time (ns)?

Round trip within same datacenter time (ns)?
Read 1MB from SSD flash memory (Elephant-Lite) time (ns)?
Disk seek time (ns)?
Read 1 MB sequentially from 1 Gbps network time (ns)?
Read 1 MB sequentially from disk time (ns)?
Send packet CA->Netherlands->CA time (ns)?

Integer and float registers total (bytes)?
L1 cache size for each Opteron core (bytes)?
L2 cache size for each Opteron core (bytes)?
